column3: User story description
Team communication & management activities
Daily Stand Up - Scrum Poker - Retrospective - Sprint Demos, Other meetings 20%
Epic 0: Analysis and basic setups
Analysis and Environment Setup
Onboarding the team members on the project
Review AlbertHeijn API scraper functions and APIs
Review Picnic API scraper and it's API end points
Review Jumbo web scraper and it's available APIs
Review plus web scraper and API end points
Technical budgeting strategy R&D to maintain the initial budget
Prepare backend development repository
Basic setup of backend repository and its API doc structure
Basic setup of Android and IOS applications using Capacitor
Prepare UI/UX design system
Setting up project management infrastructure
Epic 1 : Build the core system infrastructure, product aggregation, and admin panel basics.
As a developer, I want to design the database structure
Deploy project on development server
As a DevOps engineer I want to set up project's infrastructure
As [developer] I have to setup & dockerize a aggregator codebase
As an admin, I want to log in to the portal so that I can access and manage the system securely
As an admin, I want to set a password during my first login or after a reset so that I can securely access my account
As an admin, I want to use the "Forgot Password" feature so that I can recover access to my account if I forget my credentials
As an admin, I want to receive welcome and reset password emails so that I am guided through account setup or recovery
As an admin, I want to log out of the portal so that I can ensure my account's security when leaving the session
As a developer, I want to retrieve product data from supermarket APIs so that I can maintain an up-to-date product catalog.
As a system administrator, I want periodic data fetches to occur every 24 hours so that the database remains current without manual intervention.
As a developer, I want the system to respect API rate limits so that we comply with supermarket policies and avoid service interruptions.
As an admin, I want to create a new category so that I can organize items effectively
As an admin, I want to view all categories in a list or grid so that I can understand the current structure
As an admin, I want to create a new label so that I can tag and identify items more effectively.
As an admin, I want to view all labels in a list or grid so that I can see which labels are available.
As an admin, I want to edit existing labels so that I can correct errors or update their attributes.
As an admin, I want to delete a label so that I can remove outdated or unused labels from the system
As an admin, I want to search for specific labels by name or keyword so that I can locate them efficiently
As an admin, I want to edit existing categories so that I can update their names or attributes as needed
As an admin, I want to search for specific categories by name or keyword so that I can find them quickly
As an admin, I want to delete a category so that I can remove unused or irrelevant ones from the system
As a developer I want to prepare the development environment
Implement cron jobs to fetch and update data in develop environment
We need to map and sync captured data from aggregators to supermarty
As a developer, I want an automated process to relate the market products in different supermarkets to the corresponding system products in the system
As an admin, I want to create a new system product so that I can add new products to the system.
As an admin, I want to publish or unpublish system products so that I can control what is visible to end users.
As an admin, I want to search for products by name or tags so that I can quickly find specific items in the system.
As an admin, I want to view a list of system products so that I can monitor and manage product data efficiently.
As an admin, I want to filter categories based on certain criteria (e.g., status, type) so that I can narrow down the results
As a user, I want to see similar products grouped together so that I can choose the best option easily.
As an admin, I want to filter products by various attributes so that I can refine the product list for specific management tasks.
As a user, I want prices to be displayed in a standard format (e.g., price per kg and total price) so that I can compare products easily.
As a user, I want product weights to be standardized (e.g., grams, liters) so that I can easily understand and compare the quantities of different items.
As an admin, I want to filter labels based on certain criteria (e.g., type, associated categories) so that I can refine the results
Jumbo | As a developer, I want to retrieve product data from supermarket APIs so that I can maintain an up-to-date product catalog.
As a user, I want nutritional information to be standardized so that I can make informed choices about my purchases.
As [developer] I have to refactor aggregation services & make them more safe in which times that might be error happened
Epic 2: Meal management, Bag management, Categories page for users, Product list for users, Product single page for users, Authentication, Bags for users, meals for users
As a team member, I want to implement feedback from the previous epic so that the product aligns with stakeholder expectations and enhances user satisfaction.
As a DevOps, I want to set up the frontend infrastructure so that the project has a scalable and maintainable foundation
As an admin, I want to have an overview of all bags so that I can monitor and manage their contents effectively.
As an admin, I want to add new bags so that I can include additional inventory into the system.
As an admin, I want to edit bag details so that I can update information accurately when needed.
As an admin, I want to delete bags so that I can remove outdated or irrelevant items from the system.
As an admin, I want to filter bags so that I can quickly locate specific items or groups for review.
As an admin, I want to have an overview of all meals so that I can manage and monitor meal plans comprehensively.
As an admin, I want to add new meals so that I can expand and update the available meal options.
As an admin, I want to edit meal details so that I can update ingredients, recipes, or other relevant information as needed.
As an admin, I want to delete meals so that I can remove obsolete or undesired options from the system.
As an admin, I want to search and filter meals so that I can quickly locate specific meals or categories for efficient management.
As an admin, I want to view an overview of users, including their name, and other details, so that I can quickly understand user profiles and manage them efficiently.
As an admin, I want to edit a user's information and change their role so that I can update their permissions or account details as necessary.
As a user, I want to prepare the page structure
As a user, I want to view a product's header so that I can quickly identify the product.
As a user, I want to see the title, description, and price of a product so that I can understand what it is and how much it costs.
As a user, I want to view the Nutri-score and labels of a product so that I can make informed choices about its nutritional value.
As a user, I want to compare supermarket prices for a product so that I can choose the most affordable option.
As a user, I want to add a product to my cart directly from the price comparison list so that I can shop conveniently.
As a user, I want to access the detailed nutritional information of a product so that I can assess if it meets my dietary needs.
As a user, I want to see a list of similar products so that I can explore alternatives.
As a user, I want to discover meals that include the product so that I can find ideas for using it.
As a user, I want to view the category header and title so that I know which type of products I am browsing.
As a user, I want to see a list of sub-categories so that I can narrow down my search to specific types of products.
As a user, I want to see a list of categories and so that I can narrow down my search to specific types of products.
As a user, I want to view related recipes in a selected category so that I can find cooking inspiration.
As a user, I want to see the products in a selected category with lazy loading so that I can browse efficiently without waiting for all items to load at once.
As a user, I want to filter products based on labels and food types so that I can easily find what suits my preferences or needs.
As a user, I want to see a list of similar bags so that I can explore alternatives.
Bag category and meal category management in admin panel
As an admin, I want to create meal category so I can categorize my meals in meaningful groups
As an admin, I want to have an overview of the meal categories so that I can see the meal categories at 1 glance
As an admin, I want to have the ability to delete the meal categories so that I can get rid of the unwanted meal categories
As an admin, I want to have the ability to edit the meal categories so that I can adjust the needed info in meal categories
As an admin, I want to create bag category so I can categorize my bags in meaningful groups
As an admin, I want to have an overview of the bags categories so that I can see the bag categories at 1 glance
As an admin, I want to have the ability to delete the bag categories so that I can get rid of the unwanted bag categories
As an admin, I want to have the ability to edit the bag categories so that I can adjust the needed info in bag categories
Authentication
As a user, I want to sign up so that I can create an account and access the platform.
As a user, I want to log in so that I can access my account securely.
As a user, I want to set a password during my first login or reset process so that I can secure my account.
As a user, I want to have my session automatically refreshed so that I don't have to log in repeatedly.
As a user, I want to log out so that I can secure my account after using the platform.
Epic 3: Discover, Shoping cart and check out pages in user portal, meal and bag categories
Meal categories and details in user panel
As a user, I want to see the meal categories so that I can find relevent meals easily via navigating within the meal categories
As a user, I want to see the Popular meal recipes block in meal category so that I can see the most intresting recipes
As a user, I want to see the meal list connected to a meal category so that I can find the recipe that I like
As a user, I want to see the header, title, and total price of a meal so that I can understand what it is and how much it costs.
As a user, I want to see the meal's recipe as a plain text so that I can learn how to cook it
As a user, I want to view the Nutri-score of a meal so that I can make informed choices about its nutritional value.
As a user, I want to compare supermarket prices for a meal so that I can choose the most affordable option.
As a user, I want to see the list of the grocery items in the meal and add a product to my cart directly from the price comparison list so that I can shop conveniently.
Bags categories and details in user panel
As a user, I want to see the bag categories so that I can find relevent bagls easily via navigating within the bag categories
As a user, I want to see the Popular bags block in meal category so that I can see the most intresting bags
As a user, I want to see the bag list connected to a bag category so that I can find the bag that I like
As a user, I want to see the header, title, description, and total price of a bag so that I can understand what it is and how much it costs.
As a user, I want to view the Nutri-score of a bag so that I can make informed choices about its nutritional value.
As a user, I want to compare supermarket prices for a bag so that I can choose the most affordable option.
As a user, I want to see the list of the grocery items in the bag and add a product to my cart directly from the price comparison list so that I can shop conveniently.
As a team member, I want to implement feedback from the previous epic so that the product aligns with stakeholder expectations and enhances user satisfaction.
Discover, Bags, and Meal pages
As a user, I want to view my shopping list so that I can keep track of items to purchase.
As a user, I want to see a list of similar meals so that I can explore alternatives.
As a user, I want to explore the discover page so that I can browse different products, meals, and bags.
As a user, I want to be able to switch between tabs in the discover page so that I can filter the data
As an admin, I want to be able to upload vertical rectangle thumbnail to be shown
Shopping cart and Check out
As a user, I want to view the Nutri-Scores and labels for my shopping list so that I can make healthy choices.
As a user, I want to see a nutritional information table for my shopping list so that I can evaluate my diet.
Nutritional values and charactristic of meals and bags
As a user, I want to access the detailed nutritional information of a meal so that I can assess if it meets my dietary needs.
As a user, I want know the charactristic of a meal to beware if it is having specific features such as halal, gluten-free, ...
As a user, I want to access the detailed nutritional information of a bag so that I can assess if it meets my dietary needs.
As a user, I want know the charactristic of a bag to beware if it is having specific features such as halal, gluten-free, ...
Epic 4: miscellaneous
Feedback on the admin panel
Make the market product list selectable via select boxes
As an admin, I want to create/edit labels directly in bag/meal/product pages
As an admin, I want to see the categories based on their parent on the category overview page
Nutritional value visibility in meal creation for admins.
The navigation menu should be organized based on hierarchy
As a user, I want to redirect my shopping list to the AlbertHeijn web store so that I can complete my purchase.
As a user, I want to redirect my shopping list to the Plus web store so that I can complete my purchase.
As a user, I want to redirect my shopping list to the Jumbo web store so that I can complete my purchase.
As a user, I want to have single market product pages so that I can see see the real data of each market product
As a user, I want to see the application in Dutch
As a user, I want to add meals and bags to my shopping cart and complete the flow of shopping
As a user, I want to be able to delete my account so that if I decide not to continue on the app I can remove my data
As a user/admin, I want to receive emails in neat template with Super Marty's color pallate
Adding tags/labels to products
As a user, I want to filter products/ meals, and bags with the labels attached to them
As an admin, I want to be able to skip the markets while creating product groups
As a user, I want to be able to start the check out process for Plus
As an admin, I want to define the order of appearance for product/bag/ meal categories
As a user, I want to have a profile page, in which I can manage my account details
Filters for product overview in the admin panel
Separating minerals from fat, and energy, etc
Miscellaneous
As a user, I want to provide information about my intolerances so that the platform can personalize my experience.
As a user, I want to have a search bar so that I can find the products that I am looking for
As a user, I want to see the application in Dutch
As a user, I want to create a custom bag so that I can personalize my shopping experience with my preferred items.
As a user, I want to share my bag with others so that they can see and collaborate on my selected items.
As a user, I want to filter products based on the market so that I can see only the items available in my preferred store.
As a user, I want to receive personalized suggestions so that I can quickly find relevant products based on my preferences and shopping history.
As a user, I want to add items to my favorites so that I can easily access and purchase them later.
As a user, I want to save my custom bags so that I can reuse them for future shopping sessions.
As a user, I want to share a bag or meal in other apps and social media so that I can recommend products to friends and family.
As a user, I want to set minimum and maximum price ranges so that I can find products that fit within my budget.
As a user, I want to find the nearest market so that I can shop conveniently and reduce travel time.
As a user, I want to like, dislike, or rate bags/meals so that I can improve recommendations and help other users make better choices.
As a user, I want to filter products based on various criteria such as so that I can quickly find what I am looking for.
As an admin, I want a section where I can create and manage non-food product packages, so that I can organize and sell non-food items separately from food-related products.
As an admin, I want to input data for creating bags, including the number of days, number of people, and meal types, so that I can generate meal bags with the appropriate quantities for customers.
Release of the Platform
Setup and configure live server
Setup application
Insert the base data
configure the monitoring and backup
Total estimated time + risk margin of 15%
Total remaining time
